name: CCLAB
goal:
CCLab tries to build and upkeep a globally renowned evaluation laboratory, or using the EU term, conformity assessment body.
Regarding the current registration, CCLab tries to register for the Stakeholder Cybersecurity Certification Group, see:
https://ec.europa.eu/digital-single-market/en/news/call-applications-selection-members-stakeholder-cybersecurity-certification-group.
The registration asks for a transparency register identification number, hence the current registry.
interests: Borders and Security, Communication, Digital economy and society, Education and training
euInitiatives:
EU Cybersecurity Act, as of:

REGULATION (EU) 2019/881 OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL
of 17 April 2019 on ENISA (the European Union Agency for Cybersecurity) and on information and communications technology cybersecurity certification and repealing Regulation (EU) No 526/2013 (Cybersecurity Act)
